description: doc: update Go1 release notes in light of the crypto/hmac change.

messages.text:
Hello r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

also run make in that directory to generate go1.html and add it to the CL http://codereview.appspot.com/5532108/diff/4001/doc/go1.tmpl File doc/go1.tmpl (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5532108/diff/4001/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode617 doc/go1.tmpl:617: In Go 1, the hash specific functions, such as hmac.NewMD5, have s/hash specific/hash-specific/ http://codereview.appspot.com/5532108/diff/4001/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode618 doc/go1.tmpl:618: been removed from crypto/hmac. hmac.New can be used sentences begin with a capital letter. rewrite to fix. but in any case i find the second sentence hard to understand. http://codereview.appspot.com/5532108/diff/4001/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode624 doc/go1.tmpl:624: gofix will perform the needed changes. s/gofix/Gofix/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=26fe71b2f5d4 ***

doc: update Go1 release notes in light of the crypto/hmac change.

R=r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5532108

http://codereview.appspot.com/5532108/diff/4001/doc/go1.tmpl File doc/go1.tmpl (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5532108/diff/4001/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode617 doc/go1.tmpl:617: In Go 1, the hash specific functions, such as hmac.NewMD5, have On 2012/01/20 17:55:59, r wrote: > s/hash specific/hash-specific/ Done. http://codereview.appspot.com/5532108/diff/4001/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode618 doc/go1.tmpl:618: been removed from crypto/hmac. hmac.New can be used On 2012/01/20 17:55:59, r wrote: > sentences begin with a capital letter. rewrite to fix. but in any case i find > the second sentence hard to understand. Done. http://codereview.appspot.com/5532108/diff/4001/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode624 doc/go1.tmpl:624: gofix will perform the needed changes. On 2012/01/20 17:55:59, r wrote: > s/gofix/Gofix/ Done.

subject: code review 5532108: doc: update Go1 release notes in light of the crypto/hm...
